question:
You have recently applied for a course at a college and have been accepted. However, you cannot join the course due to some reasons.
Write a letter to the principal of the college. In your letter:

which course you have been applied for
why you cannot join the course
ask about the possibility of the course in the future
text: I am writing this letter to you firstly due to thank you for my acceptance and then express my unfortunately and give my excuse about this course which was very important for me and I completely have an exact plan for that, however, I could not attend it because of some reasons.

Firstly, I applied for auditing training in your college due to my degree in accounting, this course makes me more effective and gives me more opportunities to hire by popular companies in the future.

Unfortunately, I can attend this course on time,  because last week I had a very bad accident and currently I had a complicated operation, moreover, my doctor said I needed to stay in the hospital at least for a month.
Finally, due to my interest and this problem, I want to ask you is it possible whatever I can start my training  next month.
Thank you for taking your time and consideration of my letter. I looking forward to hearing from you.
